name: alien_planet_1.1
description: Fly your ship to an alien planet to discover what's there...
epilogue: There are signs of life, but it looks dangerous.

branches.name: alien_planet_2.1
branches.description: It looks too risky; fly back home.  At least you've collected a lot of interesting data that can be sold.
branches.epilogue: You arrive back at the station.

branches.name: alien_planet_2.2
branches.description: Enter the planet's orbit and scan for a landing zone.
branches.epilogue: You descend through the weak atmosphere and land in a shadowed valley.

branches.name: alien_planet_3.1
branches.epilogue: You'll spend the evening scraping bio crust off your boots, but you got the job done.  You set Autopilot on its course and return home.

name: clean_nuclear_spill_1.1
description: The reactor is leaking again and you need to clean it up.  Don't forget your hazmat suit.
epilogue: Wait, this isn't nuclear fuel... the cantina's urinal was leaking.

name: data_entry_1.1
description: Import radio telescope scan data into the star map supercomputer.
epilogue: You entered so much data.  Billions and billions of pages...

name: space_walk_1.1
description: Space walk outside the command module and upgrade the Deep Space Comm Radio.
epilogue: Now we finally have enough bandwidth to download space porn.
